TemplateConfiguration._Description: Creates a generic NMML project file.

<meta title="${ProjectName}" package="com.testing.myapplication" version="1.0.0" company="${AuthorCompany}" /> <app main="${SafeProjectName}" file="${SafeProjectName}" path="Export" />
<window width="800" height="600" unless="mobile" /> <window fps="30" />
<source path="Source" />
<haxelib name="nme" />
<assets path="Assets" rename="assets" include="*" exclude="nme.svg" />
<icon path="Assets/nme.svg" />
<ndll name="std" /> <ndll name="regexp" /> <ndll name="zlib" /> <ndll name="nme" haxelib="nme" />
</project>
